video.title: Care Bears: Welcome to Care-a-Lot
video.synopsis: Nestled in a faraway cloud is a rainbow-colored world called Care-a-Lot, home to the magical Care Bears who each have a special talent.

episodes.synopsis: While Funshine and a girl named Penny are playing, they're too busy having fun to notice Grumpy, who's gotten himself into a tight spot.
episodes.title: Compassion - NOT!

episodes.synopsis: When star performer Harmony loses her voice just before a show, a shy girl named Phoebe agrees to stand in for her.
episodes.title: Show of Shyness

episodes.synopsis: When Grumpy's Care-a-Van is attacked, the bears have a sneaking suspicion that the mythical Scare Bear is back in town.
episodes.title: Sleuth of Bears

episodes.synopsis: When Tenderheart goes on vacation, the Care Bears invite a child named Clem to visit -- but he turns out to be a nasty troublemaker.
episodes.title: When the Bear's Away

episodes.synopsis: When everyone at the Share-a-Lot Potluck raves about Grumpy's cookies, a jealous Share tries to reclaim her title as Best Bear Baker.
episodes.title: Jealous Tea

episodes.synopsis: When Funshine wins the Care Bearathon, the victory goes to his head. But he gets taught a lesson when he goes against Grumpy in a pie-eating contest.
episodes.title: Sunshine

episodes.synopsis: When the bears wake up with an unusual flu that causes them to swap personalities, Tenderheart and Harmony must help find a cure.
episodes.title: Feeling Flu

episodes.synopsis: None of the other Care Bears believes Wonderheart when she catches a human girl named Riley telling one white lie after another about her life.
episodes.title: Untruths and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: After finding an old treasure map, the Care Bears embark on a quest to locate the loot -- but selfishness soon gets in the way.
episodes.title: Bearied Treasure

episodes.synopsis: As the animals prepare for hibernation, they all ask Cheer Bear for help, leaving her no time for the most important job of all: harvesting the food.
episodes.title: Cheeri No

episodes.synopsis: As the bears look for the missing Emerald Bridge, an easily scared girl must find her courage to help some baby animals separated from their parents.
episodes.title: The Emerald Bridge

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of Great Giving Day, Tenderheart develops a severe case of the hiccups thanks to Beastly -- who's determined to ruin the holiday.
episodes.title: Holiday Hics

episodes.synopsis: After her best pal moves away, a young girl named Joy tries to avoid the sadness of losing a chum by not making any new friends.
episodes.title: Sad About You

episodes.synopsis: Instead of helping Share Bear brew some magically delicious tea, visiting child Susan plays video games, leaving Share with most of the work.
episodes.title: Lazy Susan

episodes.synopsis: To teach a pair of extremely competitive twins all about sharing, Share Bear clones herself.
episodes.title: Share and Share Alike

episodes.synopsis: The Care Bears teach a girl named Kaylee how to stand up to a classmate who's been bullying her.
episodes.title: Bully Exposed

episodes.synopsis: Funshine and Grumpy encourage a well-mannered boy named Peter to break some rules -- but things soon spin out of control.
episodes.title: Over Bearing

episodes.synopsis: When an impatient Wonderheart uses her Belly Badge before it's ready, she's accidentally thrown into the center of a storm in the Moody Mountains.
episodes.title: Gram Master Flash

episodes.synopsis: When Grumpy loses his cool, his Cloud Belly Badge creates a huge storm that makes everyone in the land even grumpier than he is.
episodes.title: Welcome to Grump-a-Lot

episodes.synopsis: When Wonderheart realizes that younger cubs already have active Belly Badges, she pretends to have powers so she can join the Cub Bouts.
episodes.title: Cup Bouts

episodes.synopsis: When Funshine fears that a young visitor in a wheelchair won't have a good time in Care-a-Lot, the usually unsociable Grumpy steps up to the plate.
episodes.title: More Fun with Grumpy

episodes.synopsis: When Wonderheart repeatedly uses her beacon for non-emergencies, she learns -- the hard way -- that power goes hand in hand with responsibility.
episodes.title: Beaconing for Attention

episodes.synopsis: To prevent their bad dreams from turning into reality, the Care Bears must find a way to bring color to the "plainbow" in the sky.
episodes.title: Night Bears

episodes.synopsis: A boy named Ethan helps the bears with their Great Giving Day Pageant, but he soon becomes domineering and takes over the show.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Attitude

episodes.synopsis: When Cheer Bear and Grumpy Bear are paired for the Belly Badge Scavenger Hunt, can the dueling duo learn to work together?
episodes.title: Cheer Factor

episodes.synopsis: The Care Bears help a young scout named Hannah overcome her fear of camping out overnight.
episodes.title: Care Campout
